Interface IWeatherApi

Interface for accessing weather data from OpenWeather and other weather APIs. Provides methods to retrieve weather forecasts and historical weather data.

Namespace: EnviroMonitorApp.Services.Apis
Assembly: EnviroMonitorApp.Core.dll
Syntax
public interface IWeatherApi

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

GetForecast(double, double, string, string)

Retrieves a 5-day weather forecast with 3-hour step from OpenWeather API.

Declaration
[Get("/data/2.5/forecast")]
Task<OpenWeatherForecastResponse> GetForecast(double lat, double lon, string apiKey, string units)
Parameters
Type Name Description
double lat

Latitude coordinate
double lon

Longitude coordinate
string apiKey

OpenWeatherMap API key
string units

Units of measurement (e.g., "metric", "imperial")
Returns
Type Description
Task<OpenWeatherForecastResponse>

A response containing forecast data for the specified location

GetWeatherAsync(DateTime, DateTime, string)

Retrieves historical weather data for a specific location and time period.

Declaration
Task<WeatherRecord> GetWeatherAsync(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, string region)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DateTime startDate

The start date of the requested time period
DateTime endDate

The end date of the requested time period
string region

The geographic region identifier (e.g., "London")
Returns
Type Description
Task<WeatherRecord>

A WeatherRecord containing historical weather data
